attributes.action: ensure the United Kingdom  Government is represented at the World Esperanto Conference, in Bialystock, Poland  this year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The World Esperanto Conference will be held in Bialystock Poland, this year.

Governments throughout the World will be represented. The World Esperanto Association already has consultative relations with both the United Nations and with UNESCO. The United Kingdom Government should also be represented.

Please vote here. Please vote now.

Please ensure the British Government is represented.
